widget.name: Shift Scheduler
widget.description: A scheduler widget made for people working in shifts

property.caption: People (Filtered)
property.description: Microflow returning filtered people with team/lane data (e.g., MF_GetFilteredPeople)

property.caption: Events by Date Range
property.description: Microflow returning events for date range with parameters StartDate, EndDate (e.g., MF_GetEventsByDateRange)

property.caption: Capacity by Date Range
property.description: Microflow returning team capacity data for date range with parameters StartDate, EndDate (e.g., MF_GetCapacityByDateRange)

property.caption: Start Date Parameter
property.description: Attribute to store start date for microflow parameters

property.caption: End Date Parameter
property.description: Attribute to store end date for microflow parameters

property.caption: Name Attribute
property.description: Person name attribute (SPUser.name or username)

property.caption: Team Attribute
property.description: Team grouping attribute - values like "Team 1", "Team 2", "Team 3", etc.

property.caption: Lane Attribute
property.description: Lane grouping attribute - values like "XT", "NXT A", "NXT B", etc.

property.caption: Show Debug Info
property.description: Display debug information panel for development and troubleshooting

property.caption: Day Type
property.description: CalendarEvents.DayType (M/E/N/D/H/T)

property.caption: Event Type
property.description: CalendarEvents.EventType

property.caption: Status
property.description: CalendarEvents.Status

property.caption: Person Association
property.description: Association from CalendarEvents to SPUser (Person)

property.caption: People Selectable Objects
property.description: Datasource for selectable SPUser (Person) objects

property.caption: Event Date
property.description: CalendarEvents datetime attribute (time portion will be ignored)

property.caption: Capacity Date
property.description: Date attribute for capacity calculation

property.caption: Capacity Percentage
property.description: Calculated capacity percentage

property.caption: Is NXT Department
property.description: Boolean indicating if this capacity is for NXT department (true) or XT department (false)

property.caption: Target Percentage
property.description: Target capacity percentage

property.caption: Context Event ID
property.description: Attribute to store the currently selected event ID for microflow actions

property.caption: Context Person ID
property.description: Attribute to store the currently selected person ID for microflow actions

property.caption: Context Date
property.description: Attribute to store the currently selected date for microflow actions

property.caption: Context Selected Cells
property.description: Attribute to store selected cells JSON for batch operations

property.caption: On Edit Event
property.description: Action to execute when editing an existing event (double-click or context menu edit)

property.caption: On Create Event
property.description: Action to execute when creating a new event (double-click empty cell or context menu)

property.caption: On Delete Event
property.description: Action to execute when deleting an event from context menu

property.caption: On Batch Create
property.description: Action to execute when batch creating shifts for multiple selected empty cells

property.caption: On Batch Edit
property.description: Action to execute when batch editing multiple selected shifts

property.caption: On Batch Delete
property.description: Action to execute when batch deleting multiple selected shifts
